title: Find My Phone exception for Do Not Disturb?
content:
Hi! 

If my phone is in Do Not Disturb mode, and I use the FIND MY DEVICE page, the phone won't ring. Can you help me find the setting to allow FIND to override DND?  I don't see it in the DND Exceptions pane. 

Pixel 3a (Yes!) 
Android: 9

Thanks
Lance
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
